ygData.subject: Re: Sean.Clark@UCHSC.edu
ygData.msgSnippet: Man O man.  I am taking you to small claims court for posting off topic to this list.  I did not want to read this mail, and will forward you a charge for
ygData.messageBody:
Man O man. I am taking you to small claims court for posting off topic
to this list. I did not want to read this mail, and will forward you
a charge for having to do so.

I even checked with my lawyer, AND his lawyer!



> Nick wrote:
>
> Well, I warned this person to stop emailing me. As per my lawyers
> request I had warned him before not to email me or a proof reading fee
> would be exempted to his university/his parents. He sent me an email
> this morning that was lengthy and I didn't even bother reading it.
> Again (to the people of the list), do not send me private emails. Mr.
> Clark is going to have to go to small claims court because of his
> actions.
